title: Saraki knocks AbdulRazaq as bandits kill 12 vigilantes, hunters in Kwara
description: Armed bandits attacked Oke-Ode community in Ifelodun LGA, Kwara State, killing 12 vigilantes and hunters.

title: JUST IN: Bandits Strike Again in Kwara, Kill One, Another Injured
description: Bandits raided Marri Village in Patigi LGA, Kwara State, killing one person and injuring another, while stealing motorcycles.
